message: I propose dividing the $10,000 with a 70/30 split in favor of Alice, given the higher value of money for her in this round.
I'm willing to give you a decent share, but I think I should get more since the money is worth less for me.
Considering the decrease in the value of money, I propose an equal division of the $10,000, ensuring both parties receive fair value given the current economic conditions.
